title: Yoga
description: The spiritual aspect of yoga can help yogis develop integration of the inner being as well as oneness with the Supreme Consciousness.

title: Spirituality
description: Spirituality involves the recognition of a feeling or sense or belief that there is something greater than myself,

title: Courage
description: The state or quality of mind or spirit that enables one to face danger, fear, or vicissitudes with self-possession, confidence, and resolution; bravery.

title: Spirituality
description: Spirituality involves the recognition of a feeling or sense or belief that there is something greater than myself,

title: Perseverance
description: Steady persistence in adhering to a course of action, a belief, or a purpose; steadfastness.
